pkgmetadata.longdescription: Modified Maximum Contrast Method // An implementation of modified maximum contrast methods (Sato et al. (2009) doi:10.1038/tpj.2008.17; Nagashima et al. (2011) doi:10.2202/1544-6115.1560) and the maximum contrast method (Yoshimura et al. (1997) doi:10.1177/009286159703100213): Functions mmcm.mvt() and mcm.mvt() give P-value by using randomized quasi-Monte Carlo method with pmvt() function of package 'mvtnorm', and mmcm.resamp() gives P-value by using a permutation method.
